main event: A sighting of a bright light with a red glow, moving slowly, was reported in Parkersburg, West Virginia on September 1-9, 1961.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 7 ft. in diameter and disappeared at approximately 150 ft. on the horizon., The observer described the object as having a bright light with a red center., The observer noted the sighting lasted about 5 1/4 seconds., The weather conditions were not specified as clear, but the day was bright., The observer, a retired pilot, speculated the light might resemble wing lights of an ATC.
sighted object: a bright light with a red glow
